column4: Hello , How can I make an application always start in a certian postion? ( on my second screen)

There's an app called Devilspie that sounds like what you need, its not something I've used, but this page might help you get started with it http://ubuntu-tutorials.com/2007/07/25/how-to-set-default-workspace-size-and-window-effects-in-gnome/
Yeah , I did have a look. But I cant figure out what to use as the title name.
ok, that was my only thought on the problem
